item.title: Immunoassay (in Silico)
item.description: 1 Aim of the Practical 2 Background Q1 3 Introduction to Radioimmunoassay 4 Radioimmunoassay Simulation â€” Tutorial (a) Choosing a suitable concentration of Ab (b) Testing effect of changing [Ab] at fixed [Ag] (d) Testing precision 5 RIA: Generating Your Own Data (a) Finding a suitable concentration of antibody (b) Generating the calibartion curve and (c) Finding the concentration of the unknown 6 Enzyme-Linked Immunosorbentassay (a) Background to ELISA (b) METHOD: ElisaLab 7 ELISA Tutorial 8 ELISA Experiment (a) Choosing a suitable concentration of antibody (b) Generating the calibration curve (c) Measuring concentration of the unknown 9 Supplementary Information 9.
